## Midterm 2
1. Midterm 2 is next Tuesday, March 3.  
2. It is worth 50 points towards your final grade.  
3. Expect a similar format to midterm 1, and it is cumulative.  
4. Mapping and a simple Shiny App may be included on the exam.  
5. You may use your repository, but no AI tools.  

## Group project
1. The rubric has been uploaded.  
2. Each group member should have a clearly defined set of responsibilities.  
3. There should be a "story" to tell; each group will give a short presentation.  
4. The project should showcase a range of skills learned in this course, including data wrangling, visualization, mapping, etc.
